verses.1: “Ka bei ding hun nai kuan ta a, hu ka sang zo nawn kei hi. Kei adingin hankhuk cih loh bangmah dang om nawn lo hi.
verses.2: Ka heina khempeuh ah mite in hong zahko uh a, amauʼ hong phinna in hong lungzingsak hi.
verses.3: Pasian aw, kei hong hu in. Ka thugente hong panpih ding kuamah dang om lo hi.
verses.4: Nangmah in amaute thuman a mu lo dingin bawl na hih manin amaute a gualzo-in na bawl kei ding hi.
verses.5: Paunak ah, sum ngah nop manin mi khat in a lawmte a heek leh, ama tate in tua gitlohna thaman thuak hi, kici hi.
verses.6: Tu-in amaute in kei tungah hih paunak hong bulh uh a, mite in hih thu za-in kei hong cilphih uh hi.
verses.7: Ka dahna hangin ka mit mial a, ka khut ka khete ciangkang bang ta hi.
verses.8: Mihoihin a kineite in lamdang hong sa uh a, migiloin kei hong seh uh hi.
verses.9: Miteʼ zahtak a a kinei mite in amauʼ ngaihsutna uh man mahmah sa semsem uh hi.
verses.10: Ahi zongin amaute khempeuh hong pai-in ka mai ah hong ding le-uh amauteʼ lakah mipil khat zong ka mu kei ding hi.
verses.11: “Ka hun bei ta hi. Ka geelna teng maimang a, ka lametna teng bei ta hi.
verses.12: Ka lawmte in, khuamial kimlai, sun khuavak, ci uh hi. Khuavak hong nai ta hi, ci-in gen uh a, ahi zongin khuamial sung mahah kei ka om lai veve hi.
verses.13: Keiʼ lamet ding misiteʼ gam bek om lai a, tua khuamial sungah lumin ka ihmu ding hi.
verses.14: Han khuk sung pen ka pa hi, ka ci dinga, kei hong ne thante pen ka nu le ka sanggam numeite, ka ci ding hi.
verses.15: Keiʼ lamet ding tua lai ah bang om ahi hiam? Tua lai ah ka lamet ding bang nong muhsak uh hiam?
verses.16: Misiteʼ gam Leinuai ah ka pai ciangin nopsakna in kei hong zui lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
